body_html:
Hi Frank,
You cannot currently convert a training graph using TFLite. Note that TFLite only converts eval graphs via toco. For this purpose, you will need to create an eval mnist graph (without the optimizer) as a pb and use it along with the checkpoint to call freeze_graph.
body_text:
Hi Frank,
You cannot currently convert a training graph using TFLite. Note that TFLite only converts eval graphs via toco. For this purpose, you will need to create an eval mnist graph (without the optimizer)  as a pb and use it along with the checkpoint to call freeze_graph.
body:
Hi Frank,
 You cannot currently convert a training graph using TFLite. Note that TFLite only converts eval graphs via toco. For this purpose, you will need to create an eval mnist graph (without the optimizer)  as a pb and use it along with the checkpoint to call freeze_graph.
